mdRecord.dcterms:title: (28) The Home of Washington, the Republic’s Founder, Mount Vernon, Va., near Washington, U. S. A.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Kelley, E. W., active 1868-1908
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of the east front of the Mount Vernon Mansion. In the foreground a woman pushes a baby carriage on the east lawn. Mounted on gray board. The publisher's imprint on the front of the cardboard mount reads: Berry, Kelley & Chadwick, Publishers Philadelphia. U. S. A. Sold only by Berry, Kelley & Chadwick, Office: Philadelphia Studio. Title: (28) The Home of Washington, the Republic’s Founder, Mount Vernon, Va., near Washington, U. S. A. Copyright 1906 by E. W. Kelley.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
